title: DATA-SHS 2025: Web scraping crash course
text:
Welcome to the repository of the crash course (3h) in web scraping.
Welcome to the repository of the crash course (3h) in web scraping.
You can find the slides here.
The webpage I/we created during the class is in the my-webpage folder (web page here).
To publish online the websites we all created, have a look at Netlify: you can publish a website by drag-and-dropping your folder in about 5s! (Thatâ€™s pretty impressive tbh.)
To play with selectors: see my website.
Finally the small exercise with the Members of the European Parliament is in the file scraping-inclass.py.
I hope you enjoyed the class. Have fun now!
